description:
Fish-Man Island was saved by the timely arrival of the Sea Kings, but all is not well. Luffy lost a lot of blood in his battle with Hordy, and fish-to-human transfusions are strictly forbidden!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mirai e! Taiyou e to Tsuzuku Michi!
To the Future! The Path to the Sun!
Vers l’avenir ! Le chemin du soleil
Verso un nuovo futuro. La strada che porta al sole
В светлое будущее! Путь к солнцу!
未来へ! タイヨウへと続く道!
